评论详情: I love these compression bags!! I was able to fit about 7 days worth of outfits in just one bag and it zipped up with no problems. Word of caution though - the bags hold so much stuff that it will put you over your weight limit.. lol.. Love, love them!!
I won’t be using them for another month, but I can already see the benefits of using these. I really like that each size has a different pattern too. Highly recommended.
Arrived on time, exactly as described. Very cute pattern, work great. I would buy again.
